p: Briefly, the current study identified for the first time the chemical composition of T. pruinosum EO from Palestine and the pharmacological screenings showed that the EO of T. pruinosum possessed moderate antioxidant capacity with IC 50 value of 16.98±0.84 µg/ml in comparison with the positive control Trolox which has antioxidant potential which had IC 50 value of 2.09±0.17 µg/ml. In addition, the EO of T. pruinosum had potential anti-inflammatory activity almost the same as the NSAID drug etodolac, while a 7.67 mg/ml of T. pruinosum EO treatment inhibited mitochondrial activity (cell viability) significantly and extremely by 90-95%.
